note.text: Transthoracic echocardiogram: Large perimembranous ventricular septal defect measuring approximately 8mm in diameter with predominantly left-to-right shunting on color Doppler. Left ventricular internal dimension in diastole is moderately dilated at 28mm (z-score +3.2). Left ventricular systolic function is preserved with shortening fraction 35%. Left atrium mildly dilated. Mitral valve inflow velocity increased suggesting high flow state. No aortic valve prolapse. No evidence of pulmonary hypertension; estimated PA systolic pressure 30 mmHg by tricuspid regurgitation jet. Normal aortic arch anatomy, no coarctation.
